Day 1.Description: Rashtraay's street plays (Nukkad Natak) are a reflection of society's deficits, challenging conventions. Their work provokes and encourages one to think, leaving a long-lasting impact.

An end-of-year activity whereby students experiment on scientific topics within the subjects of biology, chemistry, physics, and astronomy to arouse and engender science-mindedness and love for the field.
This exercise simulates emergencies like earthquakes or fires to test preparedness. Students and teachers evacuate or lock down, and the college sharpens its emergency plan for security.
This hackathon invites you to create intuitive user interfaces. Solve interesting problems with innovative, functional, and beautiful solutions for engaging digital experiences.

The Soft Civil Club at MITS is hosting a workshop on Building Information Modeling (BIM), focusing on its impact on construction and mechanical design, enhancing efficiency, coordination, and design quality.

Science exhibitions showcase student or enthusiast projects, highlighting creativity, scientific understanding, and problem-solving skills through experiments, models, and presentations, often with judging and awards to inspire curiosity.
The event will feature external artists, offering students and the college community a chance to engage with professional artwork and deepen their appreciation for the arts.

The competition celebrates poetry, encouraging participants to showcase their creativity and captivate audiences. It aims to inspire self-expression while recognizing and rewarding outstanding talent.
MITS will harmonize with melodies as Bandish brings Notes and Harmony 3.0, an exciting blend of Indian classical, Sufi numbers, and contemporary beats in a concert.

Day 2.Description: This expert talk cum field visit is in collaboration with the solar industry where participants typically tour facilities such as solar panel manufacturing plants, solar farms, or research centers, while the expert provides deeper insights into topics like technology, industry trends, challenges, and career opportunities.

A thrilling treasure hunt game designed to test participants' problem-solving skills, teamwork, and quick thinking. Teams will decode clues, navigate through challenges, and race against time to discover hidden treasures. The event aims to foster camaraderie and strategic thinking among participants while ensuring a fun and engaging experience.

A Gwalior city-level speech competition inviting students to articulate their vision for Viksit Bharat @2047. Participants will deliver impactful speeches, emphasizing the role of youth in building a progressive and developed Bharat.

A vibrant event where dancers of various styles and skill levels showcase their talent, creativity, and passion. It's a celebration of dance in all its forms, often filled with energy, excitement, and inspiring displays of athleticism and artistry. Participants are judged on factors like technique, artistry, musicality, and stage presence.

The Animation Workshop provided participants with an opportunity to explore the creative world of animation under the guidance of industry professionals. Attendees learned various techniques, including character design, storyboarding, and animation principles. The interactive session encouraged creativity and allowed participants to work hands-on with animation tools.

Trivia tournament: participants will go through multiple rounds testing their range of knowledge, oratory skills, and presence of mind. A fun and engaging contest where individuals or teams answer questions. It tests knowledge of recent and past cultural phenomena, from the biggest blockbusters to viral memes.

Open Podcast - Podcast in front of a live audience with guests in fields of AI, entrepreneurship, and content creation. This will also be recorded and produced for everyone to see via an online medium.

An AI exhibition showcases the latest advancements and applications of artificial intelligence. It typically features interactive displays, demonstrations, and presentations that explore various aspects of AI, from machine learning and computer vision to natural language processing and robotics. These exhibitions offer a glimpse into the potential of AI to transform industries and our daily lives.

A go-karting showcase is an exciting event where drivers of all skill levels demonstrate their karting abilities. It's a chance to witness thrilling races, impressive driving techniques, and the pure adrenaline of high-speed karting action. Whether competitive or just for fun, a go-karting showcase offers entertainment and a glimpse into the world of motorsports.

A high-energy showcase of dance styles, often featuring choreographed routines set to music. It's the moment for dancers to express themselves creatively, entertain an audience, and celebrate the art of dance in a vibrant and dynamic atmosphere.

Get ready to find your rhythm and dance like no one's watching because it's about to be a crazy night filled with enthusiasm and an electrifying vibe where a vibrant atmosphere is set, offering a chance to let loose, enjoy music, and connect with others who share a passion for rhythm and dance.

Day 3.Description: Stopnot club organizes a workshop to guide future content creators in starting their journey and growing in a competitive landscape.
A thrilling treasure hunt testing teamwork, problem-solving, and strategy as teams race to decode clues and find hidden treasures.
A platform for vocalists to showcase talent and compete while being judged on vocal technique, musicality, and stage presence.
A seminar featuring Renaissance Educare experts, guiding students on global education, exams (GRE, GMAT, SAT, IELTS, TOEFL), and scholarships.
A debate competition where participants present their views on educational, cultural, and innovative topics.
An event for innovative minds to exhibit their creativity through posters and learn from others.
A celebration of achievements with speeches, awards, and reflections, marking the journey's completion.
A short break from stress, featuring an artist's live performance.
